citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. There is a buildup of hay, dirt, and debris on the PVC automatic water drainpipes in rows 2 and 3. Animal
facilities must be kept clean to ensure unnecessary disease risks. Ineffective cleaning around the automatic watering
drainpipes can expose to guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. Correct by ensuring the PVC drainpipes
are kept clean to support good animal husbandry and health. Correct by May 12, 2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.31(b) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. There is a buildup of hay, dirt, and debris on the PVC automatic water drainpipes in rows 2 and 3. Animal 
facilities must be kept clean to ensure unnecessary disease risks. Ineffective  cleaning around the automatic watering 
drainpipes can expose to guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. Correct by ensuring the PVC drainpipes 
are kept clean to support good animal husbandry and health. Correct by May 12, 2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
